body:
- I think "MSG" should be available for everyone in the server, even though if they aren't friends, this would help a lot.. (Moderating, Talking With Friends, Etc..)

- Any kind of support?
body_tagged:
- I think "MSG" should be available for everyone in the server, even though if they aren't friends, this would help a lot.. (Moderating, Talking With Friends, Etc..)

title: /Request/MSG/

replies.body:
Plus JuanoMC. Really o.o
But you may be spammed by people....
For the following comment, I'll say that only 130 or 140 persons know the command bukkit tell, but 140.000 knows msg.

replies.body: Imagine you are new to the server, the most common command is the "MSG" so it would be really helpful.

replies.body:
./bukkit:tell can't be used for spectator--->in-game player, msg can
+1
also, let jr.mods+ be able to see all msgs, so no one can harass other players with /msg

replies.body:
+1 
Holy love, bukkit tell is such a pain >_< 
You can't even use tab with Bukkit tell which ugh, it's just so difficult and time-consuming to use. 
Msg = Thank god,
/r would be nice too  ^_^

replies.body: no... no one should be able to see, there are over 100 servers connected to each other, if 200 people would be using /msg there would be spam chaos for them, if a player has a problem with another player they should report it on the forums.

replies.body: -1 To this idea I just use /bukkit:tell but if I message the player a lot I will tell them how to add me as a friend. Vlad is right the spam would be insane most other servers I play on that have /msg your whole chat gets spammed with ads.
